message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 to purchase the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $115.
I understand your position, but I would like to stick to my previous offer of $95. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
